alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 5:56PM CST until February 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTRY PRECIPITATION COMING TO AN END THIS EVENING... .A low pressure system centered over Lake Huron this evening will track east towards southwestern Quebec by midnight. The bulk of the snow has exited the region, with periods of light snow expected for the rest of the evening. Even when headlines expire, roads may still be slippery for several hours following the end of the precipitation. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Oneida and Vilas Counties. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
